evidence.text: Person A: Ivan?
Person A: Did he say bye? NOOOO! Get him! What's happening!
Person B: Keep her here.

Person A: Toros, we have a situation here man.
Person A: She broke my fucking nose, man. You broke my nose you fucking bitch!
Person B: She did this!
Person A: Did you touch Ivan? Where's Ivan?
Person B: No, Ivan took off when you told him his parents are coming and this bitch freaks out. Fucking kicks me in the face, I think she broke my nose, man.

Person B: Ran away?
Person A: Yes, he ran away man.

Person B: Trying? You just stop him from leaving. There's no trying. What are you talking about?
Person A: I can't touch the fucking guy. What are you talking about?

Person A: Let her go!
Person A: She's a girl. What are you talking about?
Person B: What, the two of you get beat up by a little girl?
Person A: Don't do it.
Person B: Call him and get him back here and then you'll be untied.

Person B: He's betrayed all of us. And most importantly, he betrayed his family by marrying you. He's a spoiled brat who doesn't want to grow up. And he pushed it too far this time. But I want to help you. The way I see it... this was a green card marriage and therefore Ivan owes you a green card marriage fee. That's only fair. We get this annulled and I will see to it that you get a 10K fee, good?
Person B: No screaming ok? You scream and the gag goes back on.
Person A: Because I'm not sitting back there with you. You're the fucking psychopath!

Person B: Here. No questions.
Person B: He hangs there?
Person B: No, you don't. You're fine. We find Ivan and then... my wife will patch you up. She's good at that.

Person B: If we looked at his fucking Instagram we would have known this shit two weeks ago.
Person B: I need everybody to take a look at this photo. We have a missing person and we need help now. Has anybody seen this kid?
Person A: This is why we should have driven man. My fucking head is going to explode.
Person B: Did I ask you? Keep your opinions to yourself.
Person B: You really must hate me. Really. And that is sad to me. Because I let you get away with so much shit over the years. Bailed you out countless times. But I thought you finally grew up.
Person B: No! They fucking got married in Vegas.
Person B: I don't care. Shit yourself for all I care. I don't care anymore.
Person A: I just want to say that it is an honor to be finally able to spend time with your wonderful family and thank you so much for trusting in Toros and I over the years...
Person B: You know what? Go. Go back there. Go.
